recommendations: Mritunjoy Das ‚ÄúRakesh Raushan was one of the most expressive and funny people I have ever had the pleasure of studying with. He was always quick with a joke or a witty remark, and his sense of humor was contagious. Despite his outgoing personality, Rakesh was also incredibly dedicated to his studies and was always willing to help out his classmates. He was a top-performer in our cohort and consistently ranked among the top students in our class. Despite his academic achievements, Rakesh was also one of the most helpful and kind-hearted people I have ever met. He was always willing to lend a helping hand, whether it was helping a classmate with their homework or simply offering a shoulder to lean on during a tough time. He had a warm and compassionate nature that made him well-liked by everyone who knew him. Although he was a little crinze guy, Rakesh had a big heart and a big personality. He always brightened up the room with his infectious smile and positive attitude. I feel lucky to have had the opportunity to study with him at IIT Madras and will always remember him as one of the most memorable and inspiring people I have ever met.‚Äù

Pavan Ghantasala ‚ÄúRakesh is a natural leader trying to take the group along with him. I had a brief experience with him during IIT Madras and Techtable. He is very energetic, go-getter. With his work, he is helping many students and job seekers connecting them through internships, workshops etc. I strongly recommend him to anyone who are looking to be associated with him. ‚Äù

volunteer_experience.info: NCC training is known for its Discipline and unity. It was a great experience to lead the contingent at 4TN Air Sqn Tech NCC during Independence and Republic Day parade at IITM. As a part of this journey, I developed Leadership and Confidence. I got the chance to fly Zen Microlight at Air force station.

organizations.description: TechTable is an EdTech startup which is Pre-incubated at Nirmaan IITM.We are connecting engineers to opportunities by making the Ecosystem for Engineers and Startups.

organizations.title: Tech Table
organizations.description: Tech Table is an initiative by IITM students to provide one platform for the Engineers " From Learning to Earning". We aim to train Engineers and give them practical Experience to use Niche Technology through our "Start-up Connect" module, where we connect engineers to Tech Start-up.we also provide a platform for the freelancer to earn money by their skills. we have expertise in a different field to provide technical support to early-stage startup to grow rapidly in their field.
